skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: I'm so cute! The cutest in the universe!
skins.secIdle2Text: I'm telling you, Commander, Fletcher's house next door is full of people! Us girls need to help her out every now and then~.
skins.secIdle3Text: If you don't talk to me enough then I'll stop being a bunny! Woof woof!
skins.secTouchText: Whoa! I actually fell asleep! Could this be because of that fabled super hypnosis thing?!
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Ah, I feel so hot... I'm burning inside!
